definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Di4 qiu2 Wu4 li3 Xue2 hui4
tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1
Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wu4 li3 xue2 Jiang3

sentences.english: IN 1887 physicists were feeling pretty smug about their subject.
sentences.chinese: 1887年物理學家們對自己的學科都頗爲自鳴得意。

sentences.english: One of the Meccas for the leading physicists of that time was in Gottingen.
sentences.chinese: 那個時候引導物理學家的麥加聖地之一，是哥廷根。

sentences.english: Quantum theory is a branch of physics that deals with very small particles.
sentences.chinese: 量子論是一門研究微粒子的物理學。

sentences.english: To preserve the theory, physicists would have to make some changes. [Video: Dark Matter in 3-D]
sentences.chinese: 爲了保持這個理論，物理學家就必須去做某些修改。

sentences.english: In addition to cutaways, we also explain physics.
sentences.chinese: 除了拍攝剖面圖以外，我們也解釋物理學。

sentences.english: He is second to none in physics.
sentences.chinese: 他在物理學方面絕不亞於任何人。

sentences.english: He is reading electron physics at Qinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 他現在在清華大學攻讀電子物理學。

sentences.english: THE fundamental constants of physics are the numbers that describe just how strong the forces of nature are.
sentences.chinese: 物理學的基本常數，是用以描述自然中力的強度的量。

sentences.english: The successful physicist never puts on airs.
sentences.chinese: 這位卓有成就的物理學家從不搭架子。

sentences.english: The quote comes from this fairly well-known physicist.
sentences.chinese: 引自這位著名的物理學家。

sentences.english: He studies physics at a television university.
He's deeply engrossed in physical research.
sentences.chinese: 他醉心於物理學的研究。

sentences.english: She succeeded in taking a firstclass degree in physics two years after arriving inPairs.
sentences.chinese: 在她到巴黎兩年以後，她順利地取得了一級物理學位。

sentences.english: This is an combined inference derived from Axiom of Physics and observation of CMBR.
sentences.chinese: 這是基於宇宙微波背景輻射和物理學公理的聯合推論。

sentences.english: She is reading for a degree in physics in Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 她現在正在北京大學攻讀物理學位。

pinyin: Ma2 sheng3 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4

definition: University of Science and Technology Beijing
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
